text: Hermann Schweppenhäuser (12 March 1928 - 8 April 2015) was a German philosopher and publisher. He was a professor of philosophy at the Johann- Wolfgang-Goethe Uinversity in Frankfurt am Main, Germany and the University of Lüneburg, Germany. He was the author of books on Heidegger, Kierkegaard and Hegel and numerous esaays and articles on philosphical and aesthetical topics. Together with Rolf Tiedemann, he was the editor of the collected works of Walter Benjamin. He was born in Frankfurt am Main an died in Veitshöchheim, Germany at the age of 87.Hermann Schweppenhäuser ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:20th-century German philosophers Category:21st-century German philosophers Category:Academics of Goethe University Frankfurt
title: Hermann Schweppenhäuser
